actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance

official_title: A bill to ensure that each community in the United States, regardless of size, is provided with the maximum local full time radio broadcasting service.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to require the Federal Communications Commission when assigning AM radio channels to ensure that each community is provided with the maximum local full-time radio broadcasting service regardless of the size of the community.

titles.title: A bill to ensure that each community in the United States, regardless of size, is provided with the maximum local full time radio broadcasting service.
